2511859437.resolved_title: Precommitment: Burning Bridges as a Strategic Decision
2511859437.excerpt: Precommitment is a strategy where you intentionally take actions which limit your future options, in order to enforce your commitment to a particular course of action and make your threats appear more credible to others. Precommitment can be a valuable strategy to apply in many areas of life.
